column1: #Text=, Ganse , Gaunse ) was a Bohemian mining expert , renowned for being the first Jew in North America . [ 1 ]
#Text=Gans was born in Prague , Kingdom of Bohemia , and therefore was most likely related to David Gans , who settled there in 1564 . [ 2 ]
#Text=He is first mentioned in his professional capacity at Keswick , Cumberland , in 1581 . [ 3 ]
#Text=He introduced a new process for the " making of Copper , vitriall , and Coppris , and smeltinge of Copper and leade ures .
